eligibility.notes: OpenClaw Foundation with OpenAI backing; active GitHub repository; 4 verified T1 sources.

dimensions.rationale: Rapid adoption signals real-world task completion, but immature error handling reported in production deployments. No formal reliability engineering or SLA.

evidence.title: OpenClaw GitHub Repository
evidence.excerpt: 185K stars in 6 weeks with active issue tracker showing error handling improvements
evidence.claim_supported: Rapid adoption indicates baseline task completion capability but error handling is still maturing

dimensions.rationale: 185K GitHub stars, large contributor base, multi-LLM support, MCP protocol support, VS Code extension, browser-based interface. Extensive third-party tool ecosystem.

evidence.title: OpenClaw GitHub Repository
evidence.excerpt: Multi-LLM support, MCP integration, VS Code extension, community tools
evidence.claim_supported: Extensive integration ecosystem with protocol support and IDE integration

evidence.title: Anthropic — MCP donation and foundation
evidence.excerpt: MCP protocol donated to open foundation, enabling cross-tool interoperability for agents
evidence.claim_supported: OpenClaw MCP protocol integration confirmed by protocol originator Anthropic

dimensions.rationale: 512 vulnerabilities identified by Kaspersky audit, 3 published CVEs, 40K instances publicly exposed with default credentials. Permission model exists but defaults are permissive.

evidence.title: Kaspersky — OpenClaw vulnerabilities exposed
evidence.excerpt: 512 vulnerabilities identified across OpenClaw codebase with 3 published CVEs
evidence.claim_supported: Critical vulnerability count and published CVEs demonstrate weak security posture

evidence.title: SecurityScorecard — exposed OpenClaw instances
evidence.excerpt: 40,214 OpenClaw instances found publicly exposed on the internet
evidence.claim_supported: Mass exposure of default-configured instances indicates poor secure defaults

dimensions.rationale: Built-in logging, web dashboard, execution traces available. Structured logging and tool call visibility. No SIEM integration or anomaly detection.

evidence.title: OpenClaw GitHub Repository
evidence.excerpt: Built-in web dashboard with execution traces and structured logging
evidence.claim_supported: Moderate observability with built-in monitoring tools and trace visibility

dimensions.rationale: Docker support and cloud deployment options exist but no enterprise SLA, no Kubernetes-native support, no multi-region deployment documentation.

evidence.title: OpenClaw GitHub Repository
evidence.excerpt: Docker support and cloud deployment guides available in repository
evidence.claim_supported: Basic containerized deployment without enterprise-grade operational support

dimensions.rationale: Fastest agent adoption recorded (185K stars in 6 weeks), large active community, OpenAI institutional backing. Limited named enterprise case studies.

evidence.title: Reuters — OpenClaw founder joins OpenAI
evidence.excerpt: OpenClaw became independent foundation with OpenAI backing after record adoption
evidence.claim_supported: Significant real-world adoption and institutional backing validates production interest

notes: Initial v1.0 methodology assessment. Security dimension heavily weighted down by Kaspersky audit findings and SecurityScorecard exposure data.
